price: Nokorε sε, Yεbεsͻ mo ahwε kͻpem sε Yεbɛhu mo mu mmͻdemmͻfoͻ no ne aboterεfoͻ no, na Yεbεsͻ mo ahwε wͻ monsεm mu.
arabic: وَلَنَبۡلُوَنَّكُمۡ حَتَّىٰ نَعۡلَمَ ٱلۡمُجَٰهِدِينَ مِنكُمۡ وَٱلصَّٰبِرِينَ وَنَبۡلُوَاْ أَخۡبَارَكُمۡ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: walanabluwannakum ḥattā naʿlama al-mujāhidīna minkum wal-ṣābirīna wanabluwā akhbārakum
translations: And surely We will test you
